actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize RFE/RL, Incorporated to retain the gains resulting from the fluctuations in foreign currency rates.

summary.text: Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, Incorporated, to retain funds authorized for FY 1982 and 1983 which, because of upward fluctuations in foreign currency exchange rates, exceed the amount needed to maintain the budgeted level of operation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize RFE/RL, Incorporated to retain the gains resulting from the fluctuations in foreign currency rates.
